argument.name: Formatted_String
argument.description: Reformatted character data that will properly process in the REGEX functions.

argument.name: text
argument.description: Character data including characters that have special meaning in the REGEX functions.

page.description: Escapes characters that have special meaning in Regular Expressions
page.discussion: The REGEX_ESCAPE() function processes a text string and escapes any characters that have special meaning within a regular expression. This is useful when passing text, not an expression, into the REGEX functions

section.title: Example
section.description: For example, lets replace the letter "a" in "Alpha Software" with "(b)".
